Open 'https://www.example.com/'
Verify the main site logo image has source 'logo.svg', alt text 'Company Logo', natural size 200x50px, loaded within 500ms, rendered dimensions 180x45px, and positioned at x 10, y 10
Verify the 'Home' navigation link text is 'Home', font size 16px, font family 'Arial', and text color #000000
Verify the 'Home' navigation link becomes focused with background color #f0f0f0
Verify the search bar input has placeholder 'Search products...', width 250px, height 32px, border 1px solid #cccccc, and aria-label 'Search input'
Verify the shopping cart icon displays a count of 3 items, width 24px, height 24px, and background color transparent
Verify the main product image has source 'hero_product.jpg', alt text 'Stylish Red Sneakers', rendered dimensions 600x400px, and displays a 'Sale' watermark
Verify the product title text is 'Red Lifestyle Sneakers', font size 28px, font weight 700, and color #333333
Verify the price label shows text '$99.99', font size 24px, and color #cc0000
Verify the quantity input field has a value of 1, width 60px, height 36px, and border 1px solid #999999
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is enabled, has background color #008000, text color #ffffff, border radius 8px, and padding 12px 24px
Locate the user profile form
Verify the 'Full Name' input field has placeholder 'John Doe', current value 'Jane Smith', positioned at x 50 y 100, font family 'Roboto', font size 16px, and padding 8px
Verify the 'Full Name' input field has border 1px solid #007bff when focused
Verify the 'Email Address' field label is 'Email Address', has aria-label 'User email input', and is enabled
Verify the 'Password' field is visible, has width 300px, height 40px, and background color #ffffff
Verify the 'Save Changes' button has text 'Save Changes', is enabled, and has background color #007bff
Hover over the 'Products' main navigation link
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible with opacity 1, background color #ffffff, visibility transition 300ms, width 200px, height 150px, positioned at x 150 y 50, and border 1px solid #dddddd
Verify the first item 'Electronics' has text color #000000, font size 15px, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the active item 'Laptops' has background color #e0e0e0 and left margin 5px
Trigger the 'Confirm Delete' modal dialog
Verify the modal is visible, centered at x 50% y 50%, with opacity 1, background overlay rgba(0,0,0,0.7), width 400px, height 250px, and border radius 10px
Verify the title text is 'Confirm Deletion', font size 22px, and color #333333
Verify the message body text is 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?', font size 16px
Verify the 'Cancel' button has border radius 4px and padding 10px 20px
Verify the 'Delete' button has background color #dc3545 and is enabled
Launch the embedded video player
Verify the 'Play' button is visible, positioned at x 10 y 10, with width 40px, height 40px, and color #ffffff
Verify the video is not muted
Verify the progress bar has a value of 25%, background color #ff0000 for the filled portion, and height 5px
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is visible and the player is not in fullscreen mode
Verify the volume slider has a value of 75
Verify the volume slider becomes focused with a blue border
Verify the player has a width of 640px and a height of 360px
Verify the 'Settings' icon has a shape of 'gear' and opacity 0.8
Open the image gallery
Verify exactly 8 thumbnail images are displayed, each 100px wide, 75px high, and has a margin of 5px
Verify the first thumbnail has source 'thumb1.jpg', alt text 'Mountain View', and is loaded successfully
Verify the currently active thumbnail has a border of 2px solid #007bff and opacity 1
Verify other thumbnails have opacity 0.7 and opacity transition property takes 200ms
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is enabled and has a color of #000000
Verify the main image's natural dimensions are 1200x800px and its alt text is 'Vast landscape'
Display the user data table
Verify exactly 10 rows are visible
Verify the 'Name' column header has text 'Name', font size 14px, font weight 600, and text align 'left'
Verify cells in the 'Status' column have background color #e6ffe6 for 'Active' entries
Verify cells in the 'Status' column have background color #ffe6e6 for 'Inactive' entries
Verify the table has a border of 1px solid #dddddd
Verify each row has a height of 40px and padding 8px 12px
Verify the pagination control shows 'Page 1 of 5'
Verify the pagination 'Next' button is enabled
Verify the 'ID' column is aligned 'center' and its text color is #666666
Open the date picker component
Verify the current month displayed is 'October 2023' with font size 18px and color #333333
Verify the selected date '15' has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and border radius 50%
Verify the calendar grid has a width of 300px and height of 250px
Verify inactive dates have an opacity of 0.6
Verify the 'Previous Month' button is enabled, positioned at x 10 y 10, and has aria-label 'Previous month'
Verify the current date '20' has a 1px solid #000000 border
Verify each day cell has padding 5px
Trigger an error message for an invalid input

Verify the error message 'Please enter a valid email address.' is visible, positioned at x 20 y 150, text color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, border 1px solid #f5c6cb, padding 10px, and font size 14px
Verify the close 'X' button is visible, has a width of 20px, height of 20px, and color #dc3545
Verify the error icon has source 'error_icon.svg' and alt text 'Error indicator'
Verify the message box has a width of 350px, border radius 5px, and top margin 10px
Locate the homepage hero section
Verify the hero section's background image has source 'hero_background.jpg', is loaded, has no watermark, and opacity 0.9
Verify the main headline text is 'Discover Your Next Adventure', font size 48px, font weight 700, and color #ffffff
Verify the call-to-action button 'Explore Now' is visible, enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 30px, and padding 15px 30px
Verify the hero section has a minimum height of 600px, width 100%, and is aligned 'center'
Scroll down the page
Verify the 'Scroll to Top' button becomes visible when the scroll-top position is greater than 200px

Verify the 'Scroll to Top' button has fixed position bottom 20px right 20px, width 50px, height 50px, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, border radius 50%, opacity 1, visibility transition 300ms, 'caret-up' icon shape, aria-label 'Scroll to top', padding 5px, margin 0px, and no border
Verify the progress bar displays a value of 75% during a file upload
Verify the filled portion of the progress bar has a background color #28a745
Verify the remaining portion of the progress bar has background color #e9ecef
Verify the progress bar has a width of 400px, height of 10px, border radius 5px, positioned at x 100 y 200, width changes transition 500ms, and label 'File upload progress'
Verify the accompanying text 'Uploading file...' is visible, font size 14px, and color #333333
Trigger a 'Welcome' toast notification

Verify the notification is visible, positioned top 20px right 20px, width 300px, height 80px, background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, border radius 8px, opacity 1, fade-out animation starting after 3s and completing in 500ms, padding 15px, and z-index 1000
Verify the message text is 'Welcome back, User!', font size 16px
Verify the 'Dismiss' button is visible, has color #ffffff, and no border
View the user avatar in the top-right corner

Verify the avatar image has source 'user_avatar.jpg', alt text 'User Profile Picture', natural dimensions 100x100px, is loaded, rendered dimensions 40x40px, border radius 50%, 2px solid #007bff border, positioned at x 950 y 15, margin 5px, and no watermark
Verify the online status indicator has background color #28a745, is visible, and has a width of 10px, height of 10px, and opacity 1
Open the rich text editor toolbar
Verify the 'Bold' button has aria-label 'Bold text', is not active, font weight 400, width 32px, height 32px, and background color #f0f0f0
Verify the 'Italic' button has a text color #333333 and border 1px solid #cccccc
Verify the 'Underline' button is enabled and has padding 5px
Verify the 'Link' button is visible and has an icon shape of 'chain link'
Verify the 'Link' button becomes active with background color #e0e0e0
Verify all toolbar buttons have font size 14px and border radius 4px
Interact with the embedded map widget
Verify the map canvas has a width of 800px, height of 600px, background color #e0e0e0, and 1px solid #bbbbbb border
Verify the map is initially centered at coordinates x 100 y 100
Verify the 'Zoom In' button has text '+' and is enabled
Verify the 'Zoom Out' button has text '-'
Verify the 'Zoom Out' button becomes focused with background color #eeeeee
Verify the scale bar is visible with opacity 1
Verify the map controls are positioned at bottom 10px right 10px, and each control button has a width of 30px and height of 30px
View the social media share component
Verify the 'Facebook' share button displays a count of 125 shares
Verify the 'Facebook' share button icon image has source 'facebook_icon.svg', alt text 'Facebook', and rendered dimensions 24x24px
Verify the 'Facebook' share button has background color #3b5998 and text color #ffffff
Verify the 'Twitter' button has a margin of 8px and padding 5px
Verify the 'LinkedIn' button is visible, has width 36px, height 36px, and opacity 1
Verify all share buttons have a border radius of 4px
Verify the text for the 'Share' label is 'Share this page' and its font size is 14px
Focus on the file upload input
Verify the 'Choose File' button label is 'Choose File', font size 15px, color #ffffff, and background color #007bff
Verify the adjacent text input field has placeholder 'No file chosen', is disabled, width 200px, height 34px, border 1px solid #cccccc, and text align 'left'
Verify the entire file input group has padding 10px and margin 0px
Verify the 'Upload' button is enabled, aria-label 'Upload selected file', positioned at x 10 y 10, and has font family 'Segoe UI'
Locate the star rating component
Verify the component displays a total count of 5 stars
Verify the current rating value is 4.5
Verify the filled stars have a color #ffc107 and background color transparent
Verify unfilled stars have color #e4e5e9
Verify each star has a width of 20px, height of 20px, and an aria-label like '5 stars'
Verify the component's x position is 50 y 50 and it has a margin of 10px
Verify the text '4.5 out of 5' is visible with font size 14px
Verify an active star has opacity 1 and a transition for color changes of 100ms
